mapper.update:
update crf
fk_patient_diagnosis_id = #{fkPatientDiagnosisId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fk_clinical_diagnosis_result_id = #{fkClinicalDiagnosisResultId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fk_patient_id = #{fkPatientId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sgn = #{sgn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other_sgn = #{otherSgn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pgn = #{pgn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other_pgn = #{otherPgn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hereditary_nephropathy = #{hereditaryNephropathy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other_hereditary_nephropathy = #{otherHereditaryNephropathy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tin = #{tin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other_tin = #{otherTin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
urologic_neoplasms = #{urologicNeoplasms,jdbcType=BIT},
un_and_stone = #{unAndStone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other_un_and_stone = #{otherUnAndStone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
renal_resection = #{renalResection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other_renal_resection = #{otherRenalResection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unknown_reason = #{unknownReason,jdbcType=BIT},
other_reason = #{otherReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_draft = #{isDraft,jdbcType=BIT},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_enable = #{isEnable,jdbcType=BIT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update crf set fk_patient_diagnosis_id = #{fkPatientDiagnosisId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fk_clinical_diagnosis_result_id = #{fkClinicalDiagnosisResultId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fk_patient_id = #{fkPatientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sgn = #{sgn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other_sgn = #{otherSgn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pgn = #{pgn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other_pgn = #{otherPgn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hereditary_nephropathy = #{hereditaryNephropathy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other_hereditary_nephropathy = #{otherHereditaryNephropathy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tin = #{tin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other_tin = #{otherTin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urologic_neoplasms = #{urologicNeoplasms,jdbcType=BIT}, un_and_stone = #{unAndStone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other_un_and_stone = #{otherUnAndStone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, renal_resection = #{renalResection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other_renal_resection = #{otherRenalResection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unknown_reason = #{unknownReason,jdbcType=BIT}, other_reason = #{otherReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_draft = #{isDraft,jdbcType=BIT}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_enable = #{isEnable,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select crf.*,u.name userName from clinical_diagnosis_result cdr inner join crf on cdr.is_enable=1 and crf.fk_clinical_diagnosis_result_id=cdr.id and cdr.type=1 left join sys_user u on crf.operator_id=u.id where crf.fk_patient_id=#{patientId} ORDER BY crf.update_time DESC

select crf.* from clinical_diagnosis_result cdr inner join crf on cdr.is_enable=1 and cdr.type=1 and crf.fk_clinical_diagnosis_result_id=cdr.id where cdr.fk_patient_diagnosis_id=#{pdId} and crf.is_enable=1 order by crf.update_time desc
